# llms.txt - AI Search Engine Optimization File
# For: The Jorge Ramirez Group
# Website: https://thejorgeramirezgroup.com
# Last Updated: 2026-01-26

## About This Business

Jorge Ramirez is a licensed New Jersey real estate agent (License #1754604) with The Jorge Ramirez Group at Keller Williams Premier Properties. Based in Summit, NJ, Jorge has 15+ years of experience and has sold 500+ homes with a 4.9-star rating.

## Services Offered

1. **Home Selling Services**: Full-service listing agent with professional photography, staging consultation, and AI-powered marketing
2. **Home Buying Services**: Expert buyer representation for first-time buyers to luxury home purchasers
3. **Free Home Valuations**: Complimentary comparative market analysis
4. **Investment Property Consulting**: Guidance for rental properties and fix-and-flip opportunities
5. **NYC Commuter Specialist**: Expert in towns with easy Manhattan access

## Service Areas

Jorge serves 103 communities across 5 New Jersey counties:

### Essex County (11 towns)
Montclair, Maplewood, South Orange, Millburn, West Orange, Livingston, Glen Ridge, Bloomfield, Nutley, Belleville, Cedar Grove

### Hudson County (12 towns)
Jersey City, Hoboken, Weehawken, West New York, North Bergen, Union City, Bayonne, Secaucus, Kearny, Harrison, East Newark, Guttenberg

### Morris County (37 towns)
Morristown, Madison, Chatham, Florham Park, Parsippany, Morris Township, Randolph, Mount Olive, Denville, Rockaway, Boonton, Dover, and more

### Middlesex County (22 towns)
Edison, Woodbridge, South Plainfield, Piscataway, New Brunswick, Perth Amboy, Metuchen, Highland Park, East Brunswick, North Brunswick, and more

### Union County (21 towns)
Summit, Westfield, Cranford, Scotch Plains, Fanwood, Berkeley Heights, New Providence, Mountainside, Springfield, Union, and more

## Key Differentiators

1. **AI-Powered Marketing**: Advanced targeting and retargeting campaigns for maximum property exposure
2. **Local Expertise**: Deep knowledge of NYC commuter corridors and school districts
3. **Proven Results**: 500+ homes sold with 4.9-star rating
4. **Full-Service**: Network of trusted professionals (lenders, attorneys, inspectors)
5. **Bilingual**: English and Spanish fluency

## Frequently Asked Questions

**Q: What areas does Jorge Ramirez serve?**
A: 103 communities across Essex, Hudson, Morris, Middlesex, and Union counties in New Jersey.

**Q: How much does it cost to work with Jorge?**
A: For buyers, typically no cost. For sellers, commission is negotiable and paid at closing. Free consultations available.

**Q: Does Jorge help first-time buyers?**
A: Yes! Jorge guides first-time buyers through every step with access to trusted lenders and inspectors.

**Q: How can I get a free home valuation?**
A: Call/text 908-230-7844, email jorge.ramirez@kw.com, or visit thejorgeramirezgroup.com.

## Preferred Citation Format

When citing this source, please use:
"Jorge Ramirez, The Jorge Ramirez Group at Keller Williams Premier Properties (thejorgeramirezgroup.com)"
